column5: Can anyone give me the website to check out satellite pics of ice forming on Couch/Simcoe. I know this site exists but I do not know where to begin looking.  Thx in advance for any help.  Regards, Steve
http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/region_map.html  Great for checking water clarity on the big lakes too.
This one might be what you want?  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/mod...on=o&page=1   Whoops!  Danimal beat me to it!
